MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00pm to remove the generator and restore supplies to the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.29pm on 5th February 2021.
